00057 void Face::setNormal()
00058 {
00059         list<VNT>::iterator it = m_vnt.begin();
00060         VNT vp1(*it);
00061         ++it;
00062 
00063         if (vp1.getN() == NULL)
00064         {
00065                 VNT vp2(*it);
00066                 ++it;
00067 
00068                 VNT vp3(*it);
00069 
00070                 Vertex p1 = *vp1.getV(), p2 = *vp2.getV(), p3 = *vp3.getV();
00071 
00072                 Vertex face_normal = ((p2-p1) * (p3-p1));
00073                 face_normal.normalize();
00074 
00075                 for (it = m_vnt.begin(); it != m_vnt.end(); ++it)
00076                 {
00077                         Vertex* tmp = new Vertex(face_normal);
00078                         it->setN(tmp);
00079                 }
00080         }
00081 }
00082 
00086 void Face::draw() const
00087 {
00088         glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
00089         {
00090                 for (list<VNT>::const_iterator it = m_vnt.begin(); it != m_vnt.end(); ++it)
00091                 {
00092                         it->draw();
00093                 }
00094         }
00095         glEnd();
00096 }
